mdraw.ui.tools

Class OvalTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • mdraw.ui.tools.Tool
        • mdraw.ui.tools.OvalTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Action

    public class OvalTool
extends Tool
    Tool for adding a Oval object. Object is added on RectTool.mouseClicked(MouseEvent) events.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    hp
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mouseClicked(MouseEvent me)
      Handles mouse clicked events (forwarded from drawing panel) and adds a Oval object at current mouse position and with default width and height to the shape model.
